mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Comments on the result of potato crop; left Julia and the three youngest children on Staten Island; brought the two largest boys with a view of putting them in school in the area; plans to accompany Julia and the children home' sends greetings to Mrs. Horsford and regards to him [EH]. Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1855 October 1, John Tyler, Sherwood Forest, Virginia to Professor Eben N. Horsford
